skills.name: Benevolence
skills.description: During your play phase, you can give any amount of hand cards to another character.  If the total number of cards given away is 2 or more, you regain 1 health.

skills.name: Rouse [Monarch Ability]
skills.description: You can ask any Shu characters to use a [Strike] for you.

skills.name: Relish [Enforced Ability]
skills.description: Whenever another character uses [Strike] on you, they must discard a basic card, or that [Strike] has no effect on you.

skills.name: Devolution
skills.description: At the beginning of your play phase, you can skip this phase. If you do so, at the end of your turn, you can discard a hand card, then let another character start an extra turn.

skills.name: Irony [Monarch Ability][Awakening Ability]
skills.description: At the beginning of your turn, if your health the lowest or among the lowest, you must raise your health limit by 1, regain 1 health and permanently gain the ability [Rouse].

skills.name: Star Gaze
skills.description: At the beginning of your turn, you can view X number of cards from the top of the deck (X equals to the number of characters still in play with X having maximum of 5). Of these X cards, you can choose any number of cards to place on the top of the deck in any order and rest are to be placed at the bottom of the deck in any order.

skills.name: Desolate [Enforced Ability]
skills.description: Whenever you have no hand cards, you cannot become the target of [Strike] or [Duel].

skills.name: Dragon Heart
skills.description: You can use hand cards [Strike] as [Dodge], and [Dodge] as [Strike].

skills.name: Paladin
skills.description: You can use any ♥ or ♦ suit cards as [Strike].

skills.name: Enlightenment
skills.description: Whenever you use a non delayed scroll card (before it activates), you can immediately draw 1 card.

skills.name: Prodigy
skills.description: Any scroll cards you use have no range limit.

skills.name: Horsemanship [Enforced Ability]
skills.description: You will always have -1 distance in any range calculations.

skills.name: Ironsteed
skills.description: Whenever you use [Strike] on another character, you can choose to make a Judgement. If the Judgement Result is a ♥ or ♦, the [Strike] cannot be evaded by a [Dodge].

skills.name: Berserk
skills.description: During your play phase, you can use any number of [Strike].

skills.name: Formation [Enforced Ability]
skills.description: Whenever you have no armour equipped, it will always appear as if you have [Eight Trigrams] equipped.

skills.name: Arson
skills.description: During your play phase, you can use any ♥ or ♦ suit hand cards as [Fire Attack].

skills.name: Decipher
skills.description: You can use any ♠ or ♣ hand cards as [Ward].

skills.name: Shackle
skills.description: You can use any ♣ hand cards as [Chain].

skills.name: Nirvana [Restricted Ability]
skills.description: Whenever you are on the brink of death, you can choose to discard all your cards and reset to unchained state. Then resurrect to 3 health and draw 3 cards.

skills.name: Fearsome Archer
skills.description:
During your play phase, you can make your [Strike] not evadable by [Dodge] under either of these circumstances: 
1. The number of hand cards of the target character is less than or equal to your attacking range. 
2. The number of hand cards of the target character is more than or equal to your health.

skills.name: Mad Bone [Enforced Ability]
skills.description: Whenever you deal damage to any character within physical range of 1, you regain 1 health for every 1 damage dealt.

skills.name: Mastermind [Enforced Ability]
skills.description: [Barbarian Invasion] has no effect to you. You will be the source of any damage dealt by the use of [Barbarian Invasion].

skills.name: Rise Again
skills.description: During your draw phase, if you are not at full health, you can choose to give up the drawing phase and instead, reveal X number of cards from the deck (X being the amount of health you've currently lost). Of these X cards, you will gain 1 health for every ♥ suit card. The ♥ suit cards will be discarded while the remaining cards will be kept into your hand.

skills.name: Giant Elephant [Enforced Ability]
skills.description: [Barbarian Invasion] has no effect to you. Whenever another character uses [Barbarian Invasion] and the card's effects are concluded, you will acquire that card.

skills.name: Fiery Edge
skills.description: Whenever you use [Strike] to deal damage, you can choose to Compare Cards. If you win you take 1 card from the target.

skills.name: Grudges [Enforced Ability]
skills.description: Whenever another character caused you to regain 1 health, that character can draw 1 card. Whenever another character deal damage to you, they must give you a ♥ suit hand card or else that character takes 1 damage.

skills.name: Dazzlement
skills.description: During your play phase, you can give a ♥ suit hand card to another character, then you can take a card from that character and give to any other character besides that character. Limited to once per turn.

skills.name: Mind Game
skills.description: During your play phase, if your number of hand cards exceed your health limit, you can view the top 3 cards of the deck. Of these 3 cards, reveal any number of ♥ suit cards then keep them. For the remaining cards, place on the top of the deck in any order. Limited to once per turn.

skills.name: Weep [Enforced Ability]
skills.description: The character that kills you must discard all their cards immediately.

skills.name: Silence [Enforced Ability]
skills.description: Non-delayed scroll cards you use have no effect when targeting other characters, and non-delayed scroll cards other characters use have no effect when targeting you.

skills.name: Nominate
skills.description: During your play phase, you can discard up to 3 cards then let another character draw the same number of cards. For this if you discard 3 cards of the same type, you regain 1 health. Limited to once per turn.

skills.name: Taunt
skills.description: During your play phase, you can pick a character that is able to [Strike] you. That character must use a [Strike] on you, otherwise you discard 1 card from that character. Limited to once per turn.

skills.name: Ambition Continues
skills.description: At the beginning of your turn, if you have no hand cards, you must either regain 1 health or draw 2 cards. Then reduce your health limit by 1 and permanetly gain the ability [Star Gaze].

skills.name: Marriage
skills.description: During your play phase, you can discard 2 hand cards and pick any injured male character. Then both the male character and yourself will regain 1 health each. Limited to once per turn.

skills.name: Warrior Lady
skills.description: Whenever you lose an item in the equipment field, you can draw 2 cards.

skills.name: Villainous Hero
skills.description: Whenever you take damage, you can immediately obtain the card(s) that caused you to take damage.

skills.name: Royal Escort [Monarch Ability]
skills.description: Whenever you have to use a [Dodge], you can ask any other Wei characters to use a [Dodge] on your behalf.

skills.name: Unnatural
skills.description: Whenever another character dies, you can immediately obtain all of their cards.

skills.name: Banish into Exile
skills.description: Whenever you take damage, you can make another character draw X cards, where X is the number of health you've lost, then that character flip their hero.

skills.name: Exalt the Powerful [Monarch Ability]
skills.description: For any other Wei character's judgement, if the judgement result is ♠ or ♣, then that character can let you draw a card.

skills.name: Envy of Heaven
skills.description: For your judgment, after the judgement is reosolved, you can immediately obtain the judgement card.

skills.name: Bequeathed Strategy
skills.description: Whenever you take damage for each point of damage you take, you can view 2 cards from the top of the deck and give each card to any character.

skills.name: Retaliation
skills.description: Whenever you take damage, you can obtain a card from the character who is the damage source.

skills.name: Demonic Talent
skills.description: For any character's judgement, before the judgement is resolved, you can replace the judgement card with one of your hand cards.

skills.name: Eye for an eye
skills.description: Whenever you take damage, you can make a judgement. If the judgement result is not ♥ then the character who is the damage source must either take 1 damage or discard 2 hand cards.

skills.name: Bare-Chested
skills.description: During your draw phase, you can draw 1 less card. If you do so then during your play phase, any [Strike] or [Duel] you use will deal 1 extra damage (where you are the damage source).

skills.name: Sudden Strike
skills.description: At the beginning of your draw phase, you can skip this phase, then obtain a hand card each from at most 2 characters (at least 1 character).

skills.name: Impetus for War
skills.description: You can use any ♠ or ♣ hand cards as [Dodge].

skills.name: Goddess Luo
skills.description: At the beginning of your turn, you can make a judgement. If the judgement result is ♠ or ♣, you can obtain the judgement card and you can make another judgement. If the judgement result is ♥ or ♦ then the ability ends.

skills.name: Ferocious Assault
skills.description: During your play phase, you can take 1 damage or discard a weapon card, then you deal 1 damage to a character within your strike range. Limited to once per turn.

skills.name: Rouse the Tiger
skills.description: During your play phase, you can compare with another character with more health than you. If you win, that character will deal 1 damage to another character of your choice within their strike range. If you lose, that character will deal 1 damage to you. Limited to once per turn.

skills.name: Eternal Loyalty
skills.description: Whenever you take damage for each point of damage you take, you can allow any character to draw until they replenish their cards to the health limit.

skills.name: Entrenched
skills.description: At the end of your turn, you can draw 3 cards then flip your hero.

skills.name: Godspeed
skills.description:
You can do any of these actions
 1. Skip your judgement and draw phase
 2. Skip your play phase and discard a equipment card.
 For every action you do, act as if you used a [Strike] to any character.

skills.name: Blockade
skills.description: During your draw phase, you can use any ♠ or ♣ basic cards or equipment cards as [Starvation]. Your range for [Starvation] is extended to physical distance of 2.

skills.name: Falling Bloom
skills.description: Whenever another character discards ♣ cards due to judgement or discard phase, you can obtain those cards.
